title: I just read the tech support article and was wondering:
body:
Is there any way to increase the ram on a toshiba windows 8.1 laptop?
Just curious, I currently have 4 gb of ram total on my laptop and i'm not too techware oriented (hardware wise) and I run league on about 44 fps(on the very minimum settings)

replies.body: Increasing the ram requires physically adding more ram to the machine itself. That would require popping that laptop open and adding more ram sticks which is relatively easy if your laptop has space or is built in a way that allows you to upgrade it. If you aren't too familiar with this, I'd reach out to someone you trust to help you out with getting that done!
yeah, thanks for the help! I'd rather not get a new laptop and there are games I have and would love to run.
